com.sponsorpay.publisher.interstitial

Class SPInterstitialActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.sponsorpay.publisher.interstitial.SPInterstitialActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SPInterstitialAdListener

    public class SPInterstitialActivity
extends Activity
implements SPInterstitialAdListener

    Activity that is responsible for showing an interstitial ad

    When closed, it returns the ad status as a bundle extra with the key SP_AD_STATUS
